BackstoryDef.title: corporate marshal
BackstoryDef.description: Corporate law enforcement is primarily focused on hunting down runaway Beta-Humanoids. Beta-Humanoids who worked in this field are despised as traitors, and those that are free now, are hard as coffin nails. [PAWN_nameDef] dominated because of [PAWN_possessive] strategic genius, machine-like focus, and tolerance for suffering - both [PAWN_objective] own and that of others.
